comment: She is tough but fair. Dr. Waite is the best professor I have had. I absolutely loved this class. I highly recommend it.
NEVER TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!!!!!SHE IS AWFUL AND RUDE AND DOESN'T GRADE FAIR AT ALL!
No Comments

I loved this class!  I loved the fact that she let students express their opinions but discouraged comments that could become very confrontational!!  I reccommend this class especially if offered in the Maymester!

This prof is the worst one i've ever had!!!! seriously, if you've signed up for any of her classes drop them!She talks about fairness in society, but doesn't apply it to the classroom! She's rude ,and lets you know it if you say something stupid.Doesn't communicate well, she knows her info, but her relationship/personal skills suck.Run far and fast
This woman is very rude. I dropped her class becasue we were talking more about race and her own son than anything else... I look forward to taking it with soemone i like.

very rude to people. strict on attendance policy. if you're one minute late she wont let you in. unannounced quizzes that you cannot make up if you are absent. tests arent too hard. but you have to study to do well. she's just not a nice person.
No Comments
Missed alot of classes with no notice to students, I took her for sex roles but the class seemed to focus on race talk... She is an intellegent woman but seems to have her own agenda

Gives several pop quizzes which you have about 30 seconds to complete. Doesn't respond to questions in class or email. Don't be LATE! The door will be locked. If she thinks you're stupid, she shows it. Bad attitude. ALWAYS talks about her son. Avoid this professor at all costs!!!
No Comments
*CUCKOO*CUCOO* to call her crazy is a compliment. She missed class alot, but had a fit if someone else did. She was allowed to have personal problems, but the students couldn't. NEVER AGAIN.
No Comments
She's horrible---very unfair.  She picks her favorites and tends to them.  She contradicts herself.
No Comments
Great teacher. Took her over the summer tests and quizzes arn't hard at all study her nores!!! CLASS WAS NEVER BORING TO ME

This class was so boring. 91% or higher is an "A" and you lose 1/3 a letter grade for every 2 classes that you miss. That would be fine if she, herself didn't miss class regularly. The assignments and tests are easy enough, but unfortunately, making an "A" means "jumping through hoops" rather than knowing the material.

VERY Unprofessional.  Did not come to class with no notice.  Even on presentation days.  Seemed like this was the first seeing the notes she was giving us.  Easy A but came away with nothing.  Learned more from the 10 days of presentations than her the whole semester.Take if you want class cancelled

She is a horrible teacher. She missed a bunch of classes and then came back just to give us a quiz when we hadn't been there for like 1 week. We never did any group activities..it is straight lecture every single day..well the days that she's there.

Very unprofessional, she missed class 5 times but didn't e-mail anybody, so we wasted our time coming to class just to find a note on the door saying it was cancelled. Very boring, you just take notes every single day. I wouldn't take her again.

If you stay on her good side, she's great. She's very opinionated and a little biased at times, but her points are very sound. You're better off saying nothing at all than saying something halfway correct. Not too shabby.

This woman is evil. If you have her class drop it NOW! If drop/add is over, take a W! She is a crazy ****. "Power Trip" should be her middle name. Do not speak in her class, she will hiss at you. A 92 is a A; I made a 90.

Prof. could be great but has very little sense of humor.  Do NOT disagree with her. Definitely NOT open-minded. Moody at times.  Best to keep low profile in class but need to show up as lecture may contain items not in book. Follows syllabus.

Lecutures are boring.  This was my most skip-able class at KSU.  Tests are fairly easy, just go to class and take notes.  Keep up with the readings (and there is QUITE a bit), because there are a lot of pop quizes.

Nice prof. She's open-minded if you're polite. First test is ALL fill in the blank...study. Other tests are Multiple choice...fairly easy, but study. Review given. One huge paper assigned, two months to do it so start EARLY.Took attdce 1 X.Lots of notes!!
Has great lectures. Tests aren't too easy but she provides study guides. Always clear about assignments, due dates, etc. Very helpful and nice.
